\subsection{Detailed Description}
\begin{DoxyAuthor}{Author}
Cullin Lam, \href{mailto:clam@cs.uml.edu}{\tt clam@cs.\+uml.\+edu}
\end{DoxyAuthor}
Created on December 7, 2015, 10\+:23 A\+M

This file contains the main function that process user commands and translates commands to \hyperlink{class_dom_builder}{Dom\+Builder} calls

starter code provided by Jesse Heines
